title: Vaccine signatures in humanized mice point to better understanding of infectious diseases

title_detail.value: Vaccine signatures in humanized mice point to better understanding of infectious diseases

summary: Researchers have developed a systematic way to compare the immune responses of humanized mice versus humans. They used this new testing platform to show that a newly developed humanized mouse shares significant immune-system responses with humans.
